CLASSE: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CLASSE (idClasse INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, livello INTEGER NOT NULL, aula VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, stato VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT 'EMPTY');
LOCALEBAGNO: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS LOCALEBAGNO (idLocale INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, livello INTEGER NOT NULL, stato VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT 'EMPTY');
BAGNO: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS BAGNO (idBagno INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, stato VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT 'EMPTY',idLocaleFK INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (idLocaleFK) REFERENCES LOCALEBAGNO(idLocale) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE);
USCITA: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS USCITA (idClasseFK INTEGER NOT NULL,idLocaleFK INTEGER NOT NULL, timerStart INTEGER NOT NULL,timerEnd INTEGER NOT NULL,stato VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'EMPTY',PRIMARY KEY(idClasseFK, idLocaleFK), FOREIGN KEY (idLocaleFK) REFERENCES LOCALEBAGNO(idLocale) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (idClasseFK) REFERENCES CLASSE(idClasse) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE);
